scripts.start:local:windows: set NODE_ENV=local&& nodemon --ignore build/ --ext "*" --exec "npm run build && node build/server.js"
scripts.start:local:linux: NODE_ENV=local nodemon --ignore build/ --ext "*" --exec "npm run build && node build/server.js"
scripts.start:local:mac: NODE_ENV=local nodemon --ignore build/ --ext "*" --exec "npm run build && node build/server.js"
